TopicTitle: Cafe Press, how about some Polos with the Kerbal logo?

Articles.Content:
Not really a T-shirt wearer any more but I would definitely grab a couple Kerbal Polos.

How about it?

Not bad. However, CafÃƒÂ©press do take a rather large amount for the service they provide, or did last time I looked. Squad might know people locally who can do it for cheaper, then they can use Amazon or similar for delivery.

Either way, not a bad idea.

I don't know how much cafepress charges but I know someone who does custom embroidery which may interest the developers.

$50-$100 to design the pattern depending on how complicated and $1.00-$.75 per 1k stitches to do the actual embroidery(more items lowers the rate charged per 1K stitches). Adding a little chest or sleeve patch to polo shirts shouldn't be that expensive.

Naturally the cost of the items and shipping isn't included so once you factor in those my friend's prices may not be that good for your needs but if you PM me I will send contact info.
Made a design with the std KSP Logo right on Cafe Press. Says $22.99 ea add $3 for 2XL. Now do I just make it for myself or what? Hate to have Squad come after me for it for selling them!
